translations.cookies.sections.manage.content: You can control which optional cookies you allow. Essential cookies cannot be disabled as they are required for the website to function.
translations.cookies.sections.manage.title: Manage Your Preferences
translations.cookies.sections.types.analytics.content: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This helps us improve our services.
translations.cookies.sections.types.analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
translations.cookies.sections.types.essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable basic features like page navigation and access to secure areas. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.
translations.cookies.sections.types.essential.title: Essential Cookies
translations.cookies.sections.types.functional.conten: These cookies enable personalized features like remembering your language preference, theme settings, and login status. They enhance your experience but are not essential.
translations.cookies.sections.types.functional.title: Functional Cookies
translations.cookies.sections.types.title: Types of Cookies We Use
translations.cookies.sections.what.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and understanding how you use our services.
translations.cookies.sections.what.title: What Are Cookies?
translations.cookies.title: Cookie Settings
